title: Robotics and Artificial Intelligence - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/19/19
itunes:title: Robotics and Artificial Intelligence - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/19/19
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and researcher Greg Kieser discuss his work with a think tank involved with investments in robotics and technology, how artificial intelligence may work to improve itself, and explains bitcoin and block chain currency.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
